alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps; Pulaski; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 3:12PM CDT until July 17 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dent County in south central Missouri... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Northern Texas County in south central Missouri... Southern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 312 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northern Fort Leonard Wood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Leonard Wood, Licking, Edgar Springs, Plato, Lenox, Roby, Beulah, Lecoma, Hazelton, Lake Spring, Success and Anutt. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 180 and 183. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
